profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.1.8 Name objects
profile.description: Font names, names of colourants in Separation and DeviceN colour spaces, and structure type names, after expansion of character sequences escaped with a NUMBER SIGN (23h), if any, shall be valid UTF-8 character sequences.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: Font names, names of colourants in Separation and DeviceN colour spaces, and structure type names, after expansion of character sequences escaped with a NUMBER SIGN (23h), if any, shall be valid UTF-8 character sequences.

error.message: The name object does not represent a correct Utf8 byte sequence
